p: Viral RNA extractions were performed from serum of patients presenting three or more symptoms, less than 5 days of the onset of symptoms and the presence of IgM antibodies against CHIKV, when available. The viral RNA extraction was perfomed using QIAamp viral RNA Mini Kit (Qiagen, Hilden, Germany) or NucleoSpin ® RNA Virus (Macherey-Nagel, Düren, Germany), following the manufacturer’s instructions.
